shortcuts.note: Jump to a specific file in your workspace
Jump to a specific line in the current file
Navigate to a specific symbol (like a function or variable) in the current file
Navigate to a specific symbol in the entire workspace
Navigate to the definition of the symbol under the cursor
Navigate back or forward in the editor history
Switch between open files in the order they were last accessed
Navigate to the next error or warning in the file
Navigate to the previous error or warning in the file

shortcuts.action: Reveal Active File in Side Bar
shortcuts.note: Highlight the currently active file in the Explorer pane
